author: Melissa Repko
title: Walmart plans to hire 50,000 additional employees as demand continues
description: The retailer said it has met its goal of hiring 150,000 workers but still needs more help at its stores and fulfillment centers.
content: Walmart said Friday that it has reached its goal of hiring 150,000 additional employees. Now, it said it plans to add 50,000 more to keep up with sustained demand for groceries and a wide range of items, from sewing machines to beard trimmers, during the coro… [+1507 chars]
